segments.text: I see the woman focused so intently on that plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems totally oblivious to the water flooding the sink and spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t even glanced down at the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos contrasts sharply with the calm garden visible through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like the outside world is completely separate from the mayhem brewing indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it fascinating how she can be so focused yet so unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: We should be worried about slipping on that wet floor, but she carries on as if everything is fine.
segments.speaker: PAR
